```{r}

library(ggplot2)

koi_data2 <- readRDS("koi_data2.RDS")


ggplot(data = koi_data2, aes(x = koi_disposition, fill = koi_disposition)) +
  labs (title = "Exoplanet Disposition") +
  geom_bar()

```
```{r}

koi_2disp <- readRDS("koi_data2_test_2disp.RDS")

ggplot(data = koi_2disp, aes(x = koi_disposition, fill = koi_disposition == pred_disp)) +
  labs (title = "Disposition Comparison") +
  geom_bar()

```
